attributes.action: Stop the bus fair of under 16's and students rising yet again to 85p
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The bus fair for under 16's and students has already risen once this year from 50 pence to 70 pence, it is set to rise again at the end of april to 85pence. This means we will be paying an extra 70p a day to travel to and from college/school.

rejection.details: Sorry, this is a matter for your local authority or travel companies, not central Government
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
